name: Welcome!!
body:
### Welcome to my Github Page.
### Who am I?

My name is Sravan Kumar Karuturi. I am a graduate student at RIT pursuing my masters in Game Design and Development.

### What do I do?

I currently develop small scale games for my courses as well as some personal projects. I worked for @mysmartprice for little over an year immediately after my graduation from BITS - Pilani as a Computer Science major.

### Some of my Projects
1. My Latest project is for my iOS Game Development class. Together with @BenConnick , I created my iOS game "Party Popper". You can visit the github page of the game [here](https://github.com/Pioneer11X/iOS_Shooter.) or see a small video of the gameplay [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8V1hGn9SGU8)

### My Resume.
You can find my resume [here](www.google.com). 

### Want to Contact Me?
You can contact me at sravankumarkaruturi@gmail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
